# interactive_tweets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of interactive_tweets is to try out the workflow in https://datatitian.com/how-to-turn-your-ggplot2-visualization-into-an-interactive-tweet/ to make interactive tweets.  Trying to use from GitHub pages vs. Wordpress.
